## Check if ksdevice specified. If so, try to find the ethernet device that ## was defined (either by mac or by device) and make certain that IP ## connectivity is restored during the install
ksMac=`/bin/cat /proc/cmdline | /bin/awk 'BEGIN {RS="[[:space:]]"; FS="="} /ksdevice/{print $2}'| /usr/bin/tr [:upper:] [:lower:]`
if [ "x$ksMac" != "x" ]; then ethDev=`/sbin/ifconfig -a | grep -i $ksMac | /bin/awk '{print $1}'` if [ "x$ethDev" != "x" ]; then /sbin/ifconfig $ethDev netmask &Kickstart_PublicNetmask; &Kickstart_PublicAddress;
/sbin/route add default gw &Kickstart_PublicGateway; fi fi
